mapper.select: SELECT pi.*, ci.`name` AS customer_name FROM product_info `pi` LEFT JOIN `customer_info` ci ON ci.`id` = pi.`customer_id` where 1=1 and pi. `customer_product_code` like CONCAT('%',#{customerProductCode},'%') and pi. `product_code` like CONCAT('%',#{productCode},'%') and pi. `product_name` like CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%') and pi. `type` =#{type} and pi. `customer_id` =#{customerId} order by pi.create_time desc, ci.`priority` desc
